name: Guitar Freaks 7th Mix
overview:
Guitar Freaks 7th Mix is an Action game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.


In Guitar Freaks, the player is given a guitar that contains three keys, a strummer and an effector knob, all of which are color coded to perform combos.

The gameplay is the same as most music games - see the bars fall and hit the correct bar. The game generates a random music sequence in time to music, which the player must try to copy in an effort to build a big combo and gain points and bonuses.

There are three levels of skill for a player to test his/her rocking ability.
